name: More Blood Part 2
description: A selection of increased blood options on the environment from gunshots. Default 'More Blood' is recommended unless you want it to get silly. Load after Revolver mod if using the add-on version

options.name: More Blood
options.tooltip: Roughly doubles the size of blood textures on the environment.

options.name: Even More Blood
options.tooltip: Roughly quadruples the size of blood textures on the environment. It's excessive.

options.name: Insane Blood
options.tooltip: Roughly... octuples(?) the size of blood textures on the environment. Past this pont I think there's more blood than a human contains.

options.name: Actually Ridiculous Blood
options.tooltip: Roughly paints an entire surface and makes no sense oh no.

options.name: Overdrawn at the Bloodbank
options.tooltip: *NOT RECOMMENDED* UNSTABLE - Roughly laughs in the face of god and bathes in endless red.
